text:
-PsuqShadEq vaD va#naqsadEq vaD ba#r.hiqShadEq vaTth su#vaqrvidEq vaT || 
yE dEqvA dEqvAnA$M ~Myaqj~jiyA# yaqj~jiyA#nA(gm) saM~Mvath saqrINaqmupa# BAqgamAsa#tE | 
aqhuqtAdO# haqviShO# yaqj~jE aqsminth svaqyaM ju#huddhvaqM madhu#nO GRuqtasya# || 
yE dEqvA dEqvEShvadhi# dEvaqtvamAyaqnq yE brahma#NaH pura EqtArO# aqsya | 
yEByOq nartE# pava#tEq dhAmaq kiM caqna na tE diqvO na pRu#thiqvyA adhiq snuShu# || 
prAqNaqdA - [  ] 4
